statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (6,-6) and (3,-13).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{13}-{\left(-{6}\right)}}}{{{3}-{\left({6}\right)}}}=-\frac{{7}}{{-{{3}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{7}}{{3}} (if it's not already reduced)
